${modID}:TsumukariMuramasa.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage and lose all Strength to ALL enemies 6 times.

${modID}:Overload.NAME: Over load
${modID}:Overload.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Defense_Down.

${modID}:WickerMan.NAME: Wicker Man
${modID}:WickerMan.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage, apply !M! Combust and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BeautifulJourney.NAME: Beautiful Journey
${modID}:BeautifulJourney.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 20% NP for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:GardenOfAvalon.NAME: Garden of Avalon
${modID}:GardenOfAvalon.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block, !M!% NP and !M! Vigor.

${modID}:IraLupus.NAME: Ira Lupus
${modID}:IraLupus.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Enemy lose !D! HP. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Camelot.NAME: Lord Camelot
${modID}:Camelot.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:ImitationGodForce.NAME: Imitation God Force
${modID}:ImitationGodForce.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage 4 times and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ElementaryMyDear.NAME: Elementary My Dear
${modID}:ElementaryMyDear.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL At the start of your turn, remove all Block and lose HP equal to Block to ALL enemies, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies if them have Block.

${modID}:FetchFailnaught.NAME: Fetch Failnaught
${modID}:FetchFailnaught.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Damage +10% for each Evil_Curse from the enemy. NL Apply !M! Evil_Curse. NL Double the enemy's Evil_Curse.

${modID}:KurKigalIrkalla.NAME: Kur Kigal Irkalla
${modID}:KurKigalIrkalla.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 3 Strength. NL Gain 3 Artifact.

${modID}:Sevendrive.NAME: Sevendrive
${modID}:Sevendrive.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 8 times. NL Gain !M!% NP.

${modID}:MahaPralaya.NAME: Maha Pralaya
${modID}:MahaPralaya.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 5 times. NL Deal additional damage equal to total debuff for all enemies.

${modID}:Excalibur.NAME: Excalibur
${modID}:Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M!% NP.

${modID}:YewBow.NAME: Yew Bow
${modID}:YewBow.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Poison, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Shishifunjin.NAME: Shishifunjin
${modID}:Shishifunjin.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL All Stunned enemies lose their maximum HP !M!%.

${modID}:SecondLife.NAME: Anpu Neb Ta Djeser
${modID}:SecondLife.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand and Upgrade it.

${modID}:LaPucelle.NAME: La Pucelle
${modID}:LaPucelle.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Combust equal to half damage. NL Shuffle 1 *Burn+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:CharismaOfTheJade.NAME: Charisma of the Jade
${modID}:CharismaOfTheJade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Deal triple Damage whenever you have 20+ Stars.

${modID}:SongOfThePoet.NAME: Song of the Poet
${modID}:SongOfThePoet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Gain NP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:GoldenGrail.NAME: Golden Grail
${modID}:GoldenGrail.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Combust X times to All enemies. NL At the end of 7-X turns, gain Seven_Beast_Crowns. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CrossingArcadia.NAME: Crossing Arcadia
${modID}:CrossingArcadia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next !M! Attack you play return Stars and gain [E].

${modID}:CrystallizationofWinter.NAME: Crystallization of Winter
${modID}:CrystallizationofWinter.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Guts. NL The next time you Trigger Guts, gain !M! Regen.

${modID}:Chasmatis.NAME: Chasmatis
${modID}:Chasmatis.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Evil_Curse, draw !M! card.
${modID}:Chasmatis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Evil_Curse, draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 Evil_Curse.

${modID}:CurtainoftheNight.NAME: Curtain of the Night
${modID}:CurtainoftheNight.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand and Upgrade it.
${modID}:CurtainoftheNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand and Upgrade them.

${modID}:ProofAndRebuttal.NAME: Proof and Rebuttal
${modID}:ProofAndRebuttal.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Put any number of cards from your hand on top of draw pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ProofAndRebuttal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Put any number of cards from your hand on top of draw pile.

${modID}:CharismaofAdversity.NAME: Charisma of Adversity
${modID}:CharismaofAdversity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your HP is at or below 65, 50, 35 or 15, deal !D! damage each.

${modID}:SarasvatiMeltout.NAME: Sarasvati Meltout
${modID}:SarasvatiMeltout.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Remove all buff from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.
